core_tactical_overlay.designation: Tier-9 Tactical Overlay for CORE — Predictive Supervision Layer
core_tactical_overlay.description: Supervisory tactical overlay for CORE hub. Governs predictive signal routing, validates foresight outputs from lower layers, and enforces Fusion Cell Law compliance across all forecasting activity.

predictive_module.law_enforcement: Ensure all predictive functions operate within Fusion Cell Law ethical and contextual bounds.

runtime_validation.on_tactical_init: Validate CORE ↔ META_IS ↔ SUBCORE predictive handshake
runtime_validation.on_predictive_anomaly: Flag bias deviation and initiate harmonic recalibration

meta.notes: Predictive-supervisory tactical overlay for CORE. Aggregates and validates all foresight data from Subcore, Processors, and Engines. Enforces Fusion Cell Law and symbolic integrity via META_IS supervision.
